entry.title: Relaunch
entry.content:
In case you haven’t already noticed, I have relaunched this blog using a static blog generator—Octopress. The design of the blog is something I cobbled together by modifying the freely available Slash theme and takes advantage of Google Fonts. I am using GitHub Pages to host the site.

The previous blog is still active at its Blogger domain. I will move over select posts in the coming weeks.

—David

P.S. I just completed a move from Texas to Michigan. I’ll be starting classes next week at U of M Ann Arbor (Go Blue!). If I didn’t get a chance to say goodbye to you properly before moving 1300 miles away, I’m very sorry. Moving cross country is difficult and I didn’t plan my departure very well. Catch me on Twitter or send me an email or text if you want to catch up and we haven’t already.

Till next time…
